name: Dot
headline: Chat with your Data Warehouse
description:
Our mission is to help everybody in an organization to take data-driven decisions, by democratizing access to trusted high-quality data and metrics. 

**Chat with your Data Warehouse**

Answer most business questions instantly 24/7. Data teams can focus on deep work, not on answering easy questions about dashboards.

Dot understands your existing data stack: tables, SQL queries, documentation, DBT metrics or LookML are its learning material.

Users can interact via Slack, Teams or our native web app.

➡️  https://getdot.ai/

founders.name: Rick Radewagen, Founder
founders.description: analyst in a world of data; creator of well-arranged pixels; surprised language learner

# Empower Everyone to Analyze Data with an AI Assistant.
Dot, the data bot enables true Analytics Self-Service for business stakeholders.Free your data team to focus on high impact tasks by automating ad-hoc requests and more.
[Start for Free](https://getdot.ai/<https:/app.getdot.ai/register>)
Trusted by teams at
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/65295d0d4a30b15b7fd15f8a_Airbyte_logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/667d7230d983ba38a3cfb57c_landscape-lockup.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/6633b701f0de95f251a425af_Babbel_logo.svg.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/65295d80d00355a8f5d0f478_GLS_Logo_2021.svg.png)
▶ Watch Slack demo  4min 
Dot works with the world's best analytics teams
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/656050b8b43347fc4e3b2f60_Virgin-Red-logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/644a4f090888cef2a14c9a2f_6160593edef516c07a4f8b90_heidelberg-p-500.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/662b698c0bf3cd49d5282343_powerus.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/65295d0d4a30b15b7fd15f8a_Airbyte_logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/6787dc5c4f49c6423d3f755e_b14970efab69a3a8_org.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/652930d97f97d75a759b74e2_logo%20daki.svg)
##### Unlock insights in your data with Dot's AI.
"Artificial intelligence is not a silver bullet, but it can be a powerful tool for tackling some of the world's toughest problems." 
Fei-Fei Li - Stanford Human-Centered AI Institute
###### Fast and trustworthy answers.
###### Easy to setup and maintain.
###### Enterprise-ready security.
### Answer data questions in seconds not days
![check mark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/644a347fa803e326bac0ff11_Check%20Icon.svg)
Ask in English, Español, Deutsch, العربية, 한국인, ...
![check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/644a347fa803e326bac0ff11_Check%20Icon.svg)
Dot will analyze the data for you
![check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/644a347fa803e326bac0ff11_Check%20Icon.svg)
Instant Insights, no more week-long waiting
![check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/644a347fa803e326bac0ff11_Check%20Icon.svg)
Analyze directly in Slack or Teams
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/644a347fa803e3317fc0ff2e_Slack.svg)Add to Slack](https://getdot.ai/<https:/app.getdot.ai/slack/install>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/64940c2d59fe6a5d4b19e39a_Microsoft_Office_Teams_\(2018%E2%80%93present\).svg.png)Add to Teams](https://getdot.ai/<https:/teams.microsoft.com/dl/launcher/launcher.html?url=%2F_%23%2Fl%2Fapp%2F9569d878-981b-4c96-b564-9a2482f92161&type=app&deeplinkId=14b6e599-3d0f-42f3-aafc-d981280d75bf&directDl=true&msLaunch=true&enableMobilePage=true&suppressPrompt=true>)
[Dot might make mistakes. ](https://getdot.ai/<https:/api.slack.com/slack-marketplace/guidelines#ai-components>)
![slack preview screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/667539f90673ae7c73523df4_slack%20screenshot.png)
![screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/649417b4f2c4f33633d8ee89_model_example2.png)
### Ensure answer accuracy and consistency 
![check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/644a347fa803e326bac0ff11_Check%20Icon.svg)
Dot’s training space ensures fully trusted answers
![check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/644a347fa803e326bac0ff11_Check%20Icon.svg)
Easily connect your existing tech stack with no-code integrations
![check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/644a347fa803e326bac0ff11_Check%20Icon.svg)
An automated semantic layer enforces consistent business logic
![check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/644a347fa803e326bac0ff11_Check%20Icon.svg)
Built-in role-based permissions and row-level security safeguard data
### Analyze anything
From order transactions to product reviews
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/672b6559618f0a0d36b1d57e_Screenshot%202024-11-06%20at%2013-46-54%20Country%20Gross%20Profit%20Trends%20%C2%B7%20Dot.png)Explore Sales & ProfitConversation about order data from an E-Commerce store.](https://getdot.ai/<https:/eu.getdot.ai/share/97d4f032-108d-4738-a5e6-e326bcf5938e?org_id=getdot.ai>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/674097e1e589ab2c87d9a79a_plot.png)Marketing Success InsightsChat about evaluating the return on marketing spend](https://getdot.ai/<https:/eu.getdot.ai/share/9b9a37bd-cd7c-4315-9c74-d95eb9f326df?org_id=getdot.ai>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/65830074eaf8672b7829fbcf_2023-12-20%2015_55_05-HN%20Activity%20Analysis%20%C2%B7%20Dot%20%E2%80%93%20Mozilla%20Firefox.png)Usage AnalyticsSee user activity from the online-forum Hacker News ](https://getdot.ai/<https:/eu.getdot.ai/share/c80139c9-13f4-4db4-88f6-6e058ba31ad4?org_id=getdot.ai>)
### It's not just chat
Dot is an agent that will work for you
###### Find & Understand Data
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/672ce8c9bae4ee69320677a5_landing_catalog.png)
###### Lookup Information 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/672ce8c9db200fb79007a81d_landing_lookup.png)
###### Dive Deep & Analyze
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/672ce8c94d3efcd7b333476e_landing_chart.png)
Some Videos About AI Analytics
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/6618ef61af424ff5ec44eed5_2024-04-12%2010_20_34-Dot%20-%20Chat%20with%20your%20Data%20%E2%80%93%20Mozilla%20Firefox.png)How Airbyte uses Dot (20min)](https://getdot.ai/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/6618ef605d2a7b70c7be23e2_thumbnail-text2sql%20is%20solved%20-%20airbyte.jpg)Why Text to SQL is solved and what comes next (10min)](https://getdot.ai/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347ea803e322d9c0feb8/6618f47fa818a760b79ec8df_thumbnail-analyze-data-with-dot.jpg)Conversational & Collaborative Analytics (2h)](https://getdot.ai/<#>)
#### Through the blend of AI and our existing BI structures, we managed to bridge a crucial gap, allowing data to seamlessly integrate into the micro-decisions that shape our business every day.
Marcus Bernardi, Head of Data and Analytics at Daki

### Dot uses your tools
Connect with no-code integrations or Dot's API

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347fa803e3d724c0fedf/644a3cda4c81324313ddd2fa_bigquery.svg)BigQueryDatabase](https://getdot.ai/</integration/bigquery>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347fa803e3d724c0fedf/644b805e4bdda0760335828e_60e4aa44595fd0ae6cb87f18_redshift_icon.png)RedshiftDatabase](https://getdot.ai/</integration/redshift>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347fa803e3d724c0fedf/644b8086dd3b6aace339ebc7_5968342.png)PostgresDatabase](https://getdot.ai/</integration/postgres>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347fa803e3d724c0fedf/64de70b1dc0f578cb563ca4b_databricks.png)Databricks SQLDatabase](https://getdot.ai/</integration/databricks-sql>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347fa803e3d724c0fedf/6502f2888ff9965fed13a5d1_52232852-e2c4f780-28bd-11e9-835d-1e3cf3e43888.png)Microsoft SQLDatabase](https://getdot.ai/</integration/microsoft-sql>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347fa803e3d724c0fedf/671b6ec0bcb52d06ddce3e84_MySQL_logo.svg)MySQL / MariaDBDatabase](https://getdot.ai/</integration/mysql-mariadb>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347fa803e3d724c0fedf/665482e6d2b5a9e4a02b97d7_DuckDB-Icon-Logo-Vector.svg-.png)DuckDBDatabase](https://getdot.ai/</integration/duckdb>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347fa803e3d724c0fedf/64773be9670576de5d78e1ca_SAP_2011_logo.svg.png)SAP HANADatabase](https://getdot.ai/</integration/sap-hana>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347fa803e3d724c0fedf/644b80b3d72ab7d469e86ae0_looker-icon.svg)LookerSemantic Layer](https://getdot.ai/</integration/looker>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347fa803e3d724c0fedf/644a3da24c8132e0c8dde58c_dbt-logo-500AB0BAA7-seeklogo.com.png)dbt Semantic Layer](https://getdot.ai/</integration/dbt>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347fa803e3d724c0fedf/644a347fa803e36431c0fee3_Slack.svg)SlackCommunication](https://getdot.ai/</integration/slack>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347fa803e3d724c0fedf/649442c020c037feb1f1481b_Microsoft_Office_Teams_\(2018%E2%80%93present\).svg.png)MS TeamsCommunication](https://getdot.ai/</integration/ms-teams>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644a347fa803e3d724c0fedf/671b7bc242f4ba227e0a5773_Microsoft_Office_Excel_\(2019%E2%80%93present\).svg.png)CSV / ExcelFile Upload](https://getdot.ai/</integration/csv-excel>)

generated_description:
### Dot: Chat with Your Data Warehouse

**Overview:**
Founded in 2021, Dot emerged from Y Combinator's Batch S21 and is based in Berlin, Germany. The company’s mission is to empower every member of an organization to make data-driven decisions by democratizing access to high-quality data. It's fueled by the idea that everyone should effortlessly interact with their data warehouse. 

**Core Offering:**
Dot allows users to **chat with their data warehouse** 24/7, answering business questions instantly. This feature enables data teams to concentrate on more complex analytical tasks rather than fielding basic inquiries. Users can simply query their data using natural language through platforms like Slack, Microsoft Teams, or even a native web application. 

**Key Features:**
- **Instant Insights:** Forget long waits for data analysis; users can receive answers in seconds.
- **Seamless Integration:** Dot is designed to integrate effortlessly with existing data stacks, understanding SQL queries, documentation, and other metrics.
- **Multi-Language Support:** Users can communicate in various languages, including English, Spanish, German, and more.
- **Enhanced Analytics Self-Service:** By automating ad-hoc requests, Dot frees data teams to tackle high-impact projects, showcasing the strength of AI in making data exploration accessible.

**Security & Trust:** 
Dot prioritizes security with features like role-based permissions and row-level security, ensuring trusted and consistent answers for all users. 

**The Team & Impact:**
Dot operates with a lean team of six but aims to reach over 50,000 users, illustrating its rapid adoption. Backed by Y Combinator, Dot is tagged with several attributes: artificial intelligence, SaaS, B2B, analytics, and enterprise. The founding vision is to truly empower users at all levels to analyze data without needing a data science background.

**Current Engagements:**
The Dot team encourages potential users to book a demo, visit them at industry events like the Snowflake Summit, and get a feel for how they can enhance their data analytics capabilities—plus, who doesn’t love free socks?

**Conclusion:**
With Dot, navigating data doesn’t have to be a labyrinthine task reserved for experts. Instead, it offers a friendly, AI-driven approach to analytics, making it possible for anyone in an organization to converse with their data. If you’re looking to transform your data interactions, Dot seems like a straightforward, insightful solution to explore.

For more, visit [GetDot.ai](https://getdot.ai) and start chatting with your data today!
